Text: A inferior rendition of Jane Austen
such a great movie, the last scene is missing!! the scene where they are married and sitting out by the pond is not in this!!
@borgenhaust: Oh thank you very much for spoiling everyone about the ending! Best thing ever when I'm about to watch a movie. FUCK YOU

hehe, well, it was based on a book so kinda hard to spoil the movie unless you've never read the book...however, there were no kissing scenes in the book.  @borgenhaust: this is the UK version w/o the alternate ending only released in the US and Canada.

Too heavy for a no-so-good quality.
Thank anyway.
